title: UserUCConfig
description: Configuration file for ucbuilder-based Electron applications.

env.description: Specifies the environment mode. 'developer' enables development tools and debugging, while 'user' is for production.

preloadMain.description: List of preload script file paths to be injected into Electron's main process.

browser.description: Browser configuration including module import maps and global aliases.

importmap.description: Defines import path mappings similar to browser import maps. Key is the module alias, value is the resolved path.

globalAlias.description: Maps global module aliases, e.g., 'fs' â†’ 'node:fs'. Useful for preload environments without Node.js direct access.

developer.description: Contains developer-specific options, such as build behavior and key bindings.

type.description: Defines the main scripting language type used by the project ('ts' for TypeScript, 'js' for JavaScript).

IBuildKeyBinding.description: Defines key combination bindings for triggering build or other commands.

keyCode.description: Numeric key code representing the keyboard key (e.g., 66 for 'B').

ctrlKey.description: Whether the Ctrl key must be held down.

shiftKey.description: Whether the Shift key must be held down.

altKey.description: Whether the Alt key must be held down.

UcBuildOptions.description: Specifies build-related options for developer mode.

keyBind.description: Keyboard shortcut binding to trigger a build process.

ignorePath.description: List of paths or folders to exclude during build operations.

buildPath.description: List of paths or folders to include during build operations.

IUCConfigPreference.description: Specifies directory preferences for project organization.

designerDir.description:
Path to the directory containing designer files i.e (.designer.ts,.designer.js) 
 this path will inside jsDir or tsDir 
 if tsDir is 'src' and designerDir is '_desiger' than path will be 'src/_designerDir' same behaviour for jsDir.

jsDir.description: Path to the directory containing JavaScript source files.

tsDir.description: Path to the directory containing TypeScript source files.
